item.description:
We saw the preview at "The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel" and several persons decided it would be a good movie to see. Directed by Wes Anderson, the cast includes Edward Norton, Bruce Willis, Bill Murray, Harvey Keitel, Tilda Swinton, Frances McDormand, Jason Schwartzman. Set in the 1960's, it is the story of the inhabitants of a small New England island hunting for a young boy and girl who fall in love and run away together. (94 mins)

Details, trailer, etc. - http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1748122/

 

NOTE:  Date was moved to accommodate the Wadsworth Atheneum's summer movie series.  Those dates are posted in the "Beyond the Multiplex" group.
item.name: "Moonrise Kingdom" @ Cinestudio
